titleSection.name: VersionOne HandJPublisher Integration
titleSection.shortDescription: Link agile workitems to tangible, working software in the form of builds.

descriptionSection.description: The VersionOne Hudson and Jenkins publisher creates a record of Hudson/Jenkins builds in VersionOne, so the development teams can quickly view builds associated with a story or defects. This visibility is useful when identifying what build to use for verification or when generating release notes.

updates.releaseNotes: Fixed: Incorrect ChangeSet time for Git and Svn

* Added: Support for connecting to VersionOne through a proxy. 
 * Added: Support for Hudson Git SCM plugin (version 1.1.3)

* Fixed: Closed backlog items caused builds to fail 
 * Added support for Perforce

qualityBands.name: seed
qualityBands.shortDesc: The initial idea of a product. No working code.

qualityBands.name: sapling
qualityBands.shortDesc: The product is undergoing rapid growth. The code works but expect major changes.

qualityBands.name: mature
qualityBands.shortDesc: The product is stable. The code will continue to evolve with minimum breaking changes.
